name: taxonomy_term
description: Each service can be categorized according to one or more taxonomy terms. The taxonomy_term object contains a list of taxonomy terms, their names, and, for hierarchical taxonomies, their structure.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for this taxonomy term. Each taxonomy term must have a unique identifier, within the scope of the dataset.

description.name: description
description.title: Description
description.description: A free text description of the term.

parent_id.name: parent_id
parent_id.title: Parent Identifier
parent_id.description: If this is a child term in a hierarchical taxonomy, give the identifier of the parent category. For top-level categories, this is not required.

taxonomy.name: taxonomy
taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
taxonomy.description: If this is an established taxonomy, a free text description of which taxonomy is in use. If possible, provide a URI.

taxonomy_id.name: taxonomy_id
taxonomy_id.title: Taxonomy Identifier
taxonomy_id.description: The identifier of the taxonomy containing the term.
